name: Hotel Torbrau

reviews.title: Historic Torbrau -Exceptional Hotel!!
reviews.text: This year we decided to stay at the historic Torbrau hotel. The recently renovated rooms are modern, very clean and comfortable. Parking is available. The location was great for shopping and touring Historic Munich. We did not need to use our car. In the morning we had a wonderful breakfast buffet in the main dining room of the hotel. When lunch time arrived we decided to eat pizza at the outdoor cafe downstairs. The cafe had very good service and the pizza portion was very generous. The cafe was small but cozy. They also had an inside area which was just as nice.

reviews.title: Stay Here!
reviews.text: What makes this hotel exceptional is the modern, clean rooms and the service staff. You feel right at home as soon as you walk in the door. The staff pays close attention to detail and they always greet you with a smile.
The Historic Torbrau is at the top of our list of exceptional hotels in Munich. We will most definitely stay again!
reviews.title: Great place to stay in Munich
Really nice, great staff, and even better location!
reviews.text: I went with a group to Hotel Torbrau for a week. The location is perfect, walking distance to Marienplatz, great shops close by, the S-bahn right out the front door, and even a nice store 1 block away that sells toothpaste, candy, etc for anything that you might forget to pack. The front desk personnel were very helpful with all of us, and we asked a lot of quesitons!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This hotel is centerally located, extremely clean and the staff is very helpful. We spoke very little German, but thankfully, all hotel staff we encountered spoke English. (Next time, we will better prepare ourselves.)

reviews.text: Our room was quite large and well equiped, as was our bathroom. The linens were clean, comfortable and plentiful.
reviews.title: Perfect location for central Munich!

reviews.text: The complimentary breakfast was a great way to start the day. It was fully stocked with an array of wonderful choices. The Director of Marketing, who was assisting guests during breakfast, was very kind.
reviews.title: A Great Hotel

reviews.text: There are lots of Bavarian restaurants within walking distance from the hotel, as well as other types of food. Even a Hard Rock Cafe a block or two away. Also, the Hofbrahaus, it just around the corner.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We booked directly from their Web site : [--] and booked for 3 nights. They have a great reservation facilities which will immediatly inform you if rooms are available at the date(s) chosen and at what price. We got ours at 175 euros the first two nights and 225 euros the third night (per room) including breakfast. We were there August 30 and 31, and September 1. We had room 403.
reviews.title: Best place and area to stay
Why stay elsewhere?
reviews.text: First of all, just knowing how near the hotel is from Marienplatz (less than 4 minutes walk) is worth the price. The hotel itself is beautiful, very clean, welcoming, newly renovated. Our rooms had everything needed for a great stay, the bathroom spacious with a shower and hairdryer that worked well. The beds were very comfortable for a great sleep after a full day of walking ! We used their service of drycleaning : excellent. The room hat lots of space for you clothes. The personnel is very helpful, the Maître D' will make you feel at home when you arrive at the buffet for breaksfast, will offer a newspaper (in English if you wish), coffee or tea; when he heard us speak French, he surprised us by addressing us afterward in French. The breaksfast buffet is complete and delicious : exactly what you need to attack the full day ahead.
We HIGHLY recommand this hotel and rate it a great 4*.
reviews.title: The only place to stay in Munich
brilliant
reviews.text: Torbrau Hotel is in such a perfect location, it is hard to imagine a better spot to stay in Munich. It is in the historic center of old town Munich and close to restaurants and the underground. (You can get underground day tickets at the front desk.) The rooms are very clean and modern. Bathrooms are large. The recently renovated rooms are not at all "old world", but there is plenty of atmosphere just outside the hotel doors. Breakfast was an excellent buffet in a charming room. Wait staff and all service people were very nice and pleasant. We had a wonderful stay.

reviews.title: Excellent Location Choice with Hotel Tobrau
reviews.text: The Torbrau Hotel is a real find, the pictures do not do it justice. It's perfectly located just inside the old city gate, an easy couple of blocks to everything, Virtualmarkt, Glockenspiel, Residenz, Hofbrauhaus, St Peter's church, Fraunenkirche, etc,. The rooms are updated with beautiful bathrooms and are air conditioned! The service is exceptional, personal, professional and constant. The rates are reasonable (for Munich), only two blocks away at the Mandarin you can spend four to five times as much.

description: Welcome to Munich's oldest hotel! The 4-star Hotel Torbräu welcomed its first guests in 1490, a fact which can be traced in official documents from the time. Today our guests can expect a modern, family-run establishment that offers an excellent setting: situated directly by the historic Isartor, right by the entrance to the Old Town and just a short walk away from Marienplatz.
